title: Katabami-san
description: A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun. Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity isâ€¦ a fox spirit!?
author: Danbou Kigu
